mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN ( SELECT count(0) FROM COVI_SMART4J.portal_webpart_vip_absense WHERE Secretarys LIKE CONCAT('%;', #{UserCode}, ';%') ) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS IsManager

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COVI_SMART4J.portal_webpart_vip_absense AS pv INNER JOIN COVI_SMART4J.SYS_OBJECT_USER AS sou on pv.UserCode = sou.UserCode INNER JOIN COVI_SMART4J.SYS_OBJECT_USER_BASEGROUP AS soub on pv.UserCode = soub.UserCode AND JobType = 'Origin' INNER JOIN COVI_SMART4J.SYS_BASE_CODE sbc on pv.State = sbc.Code AND sbc.CodeGroup = 'AbsenceCode' ORDER BY pv.Sort

SELECT pv.UserCode, pv.State, pv.Sort, sou.PhotoPath, pv.IsUse, pv.RegistDate, fn_SecretarysByLangGet_S(#{lang}, pv.Secretarys) AS Secretarys, Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, pv.MultiDisplayName) AS DisplayName, Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, sbc.MultiCodeName) AS StateName, Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, soub.MultiDeptName) AS DeptName, Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, soub.MultiJobLevelName) AS JobLevelName, Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, soub.MultiJobTitleName) AS JobTitleName, Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, soub.MultiJobPositionName) AS JobPositionName FROM COVI_SMART4J.portal_webpart_vip_absense AS pv INNER JOIN COVI_SMART4J.SYS_OBJECT_USER AS sou on pv.UserCode = sou.UserCode INNER JOIN COVI_SMART4J.SYS_OBJECT_USER_BASEGROUP AS soub on pv.UserCode = soub.UserCode AND JobType = 'Origin' INNER JOIN COVI_SMART4J.SYS_BASE_CODE sbc on pv.State = sbc.Code AND sbc.CodeGroup = 'AbsenceCode' WHERE pv.IsUse = 'Y' ORDER BY pv.Sort

SELECT pv.UserCode, pv.State, pv.Sort, sou.PhotoPath, pv.IsUse, pv.RegistDate, fn_SecretarysByLangGet_S(#{lang}, pv.Secretarys) AS Secretarys, Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, pv.MultiDisplayName) AS DisplayName, Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, sbc.MultiCodeName) AS StateName, Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, soub.MultiDeptName) AS DeptName, Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, soub.MultiJobLevelName) AS JobLevelName, Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, soub.MultiJobTitleName) AS JobTitleName, Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, soub.MultiJobPositionName) AS JobPositionName FROM COVI_SMART4J.portal_webpart_vip_absense AS pv INNER JOIN COVI_SMART4J.SYS_OBJECT_USER AS sou on pv.UserCode = sou.UserCode INNER JOIN COVI_SMART4J.SYS_OBJECT_USER_BASEGROUP AS soub on pv.UserCode = soub.UserCode AND JobType = 'Origin' INNER JOIN COVI_SMART4J.SYS_BASE_CODE sbc on pv.State = sbc.Code AND sbc.CodeGroup = 'AbsenceCode' ORDER BY pv.Sort
LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{pageOffset}

SELECT pv.UserCode, pv.State, pv.Sort, pv.IsUse, pv.RegistDate, fn_SecretarysByLangGet_S(#{lang}, pv.Secretarys) AS Secretarys, Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, pv.MultiDisplayName) AS DisplayName, Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, sbc.MultiCodeName) AS StateName, Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, soub.MultiDeptName) AS DeptName, Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, soub.MultiJobLevelName) AS JobLevelName, Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, soub.MultiJobTitleName) AS JobTitleName, Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, soub.MultiJobPositionName) AS JobPositionName FROM COVI_SMART4J.portal_webpart_vip_absense AS pv INNER JOIN COVI_SMART4J.SYS_OBJECT_USER_BASEGROUP AS soub on pv.UserCode = soub.UserCode AND JobType = 'Origin' INNER JOIN COVI_SMART4J.SYS_BASE_CODE sbc on pv.State = sbc.Code AND sbc.CodeGroup = 'AbsenceCode' WHERE pv.IsUse = 'Y' AND pv.Secretarys LIKE CONCAT('%;', #{UserCode}, ';%') ORDER BY pv.Sort
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COVI_SMART4J.portal_webpart_vip_absense(UserCode, DisplayName, MultiDisplayName, Sort, Secretarys, IsUSe, RegistDate, RegisterCode, State) SELECT UserCode, DisplayName, MultiDisplayName, #{Sort}, #{SecretarysCode}, #{IsUse}, NOW(), #{RegisterCode}, 'ABSENCE' FROM COVI_SMART4J.SYS_OBJECT_USER WHERE UserCode = #{OfficerCode}
mapper.select: SELECT pv.UserCode, pv.Sort, pv.IsUse, pv.Secretarys, fn_SecretarysByLangGet_S(#{lang}, pv.Secretarys) AS SecretarysName, Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, pv.MultiDisplayName) AS DisplayName FROM COVI_SMART4J.portal_webpart_vip_absense AS pv WHERE pv.UserCode = #{UserCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE COVI_SMART4J.portal_webpart_vip_absense SET Secretarys = #{SecretarysCode}, Sort = #{Sort}, IsUse = #{IsUse}, MODIFIERCODE = #{RegisterCode}, MODIFYDATE = NOW() WHERE UserCode = #{OfficerCode}
